module:
Module-level comment: 
/**
 * This module implements a 1024x128-bit SRAM with byte-enable functionality using Xilinx Spartan-6 FPGA block RAM.
 * It uses eight 36-bit wide RAMB16BWER primitives, each configured as 512x32 bits, to create the full memory.
 * The module supports both read and write operations with a 128-bit data width and 10-bit address space.
 * It allows byte-level write enables and splits the memory into two banks for full depth utilization.
 * The module also includes parameters for initializing the memory contents.
 */
